main event: On January 17, 1955, two persons observed an unidentified object in the sky over Yuma, Arizona.
interesting points: The object appeared to be larger than a jet fighter plane and had a white pulsating light., The object was estimated to be at a low altitude of approximately 2,000 feet., No sound was reported during the sighting., The sighting lasted for a very brief period of about 2 seconds., The investigation concluded that the object was probably a meteor.
sighted object: an unidentified object larger than a jet fighter with a white pulsating light
witness description: two persons observing the object in the sky
